Rock Your Resume with R Welcome!

Rock Your Resume with R Mai Uchida 2020-06-15 Welcome! Thank you so much for joining the workshop today! This workshop is for absolute beginners who have no prior experience in R and/ or coding. After this workshop, participants will be able to: Evaluate whether R is the appropriate tool for their project Distinguish between exploratory and explanatory visualization Examine data distribution using a graphic tool Create a simple data visualization piece using R
